item.title: That Feeling of Beautiful Code
item.description: Here’s a trivial post, but a great example of why I like writing code. I consider myself an aesthetic programmer. I want my code to be visibly appealing and I will sometimes write code in a certain way just because I think it looks better. Every now and then I write something and I enjoy what I’ve written so much that I just sit and savor the moment. Here’s what brought on that feeling today.
